api_list.name: Nearby - (ArcGIS)
api_list.description:
Returns nearby places sorted by distance from the origin coordinates in ascending order.

Only type values from **/v2/types (ArcGIS)** are valid.

Maximum returned places is 50.

api_list.name: Nearby - (Google)
api_list.description:
Returns a **JSON array of nearby places** sorted by distance from the origin coordinates in ascending order.

Only values from **/types (Google)** are valid types.

Maximum places returned per request is 20.

api_list.name: Types - (Google)
api_list.description:
Get a list of establishment types.

These types will only work with **/nearby (Google)**.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nearby-places.p.rapidapi.com/types"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nearby-places.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Random (Google)
Place Details - (Google)
api_list.description:
Get contact and opening hours for a place.

Requires a **place id** provided by **/nearby (Google)**.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description:
Place ID.
This value can be retrieved from */nearby* or */random* endpoints.

api_list.name: Types - (ArcGIS)
api_list.description: Types (categories) of establishments. These types will only work with **/v2/nearby (ArcGIS)**.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nearby-places.p.rapidapi.com/v2/types"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nearby-places.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://nearby-places.p.rapidapi.com/v2/types"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nearby-places.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
